title: UAH QuietRoom
details: Web application that finds UAH classroom availability for students to find study spots on campus
Allows searching for schedule data for a specific room
Displays room metadata including room number, room type, and capacity
Generates schedule-view for selected room for readability
Uses React.js with Next.js for front-end and .NET for back-end

title: Unscene
details: Semester team project developing a desktop Java application with Apache Netbeans
Movie and TV Show manager that allows creation of watchlists and progress dashboard of media as the user watches
Pulls data from TheMovieDB API for all media

title: Adventure to the Sun
details: 48-hour simulative game for NASA SpaceApps Challenge - 3rd Place
Allows the user to play as the Parker Solar Probe on its mission around the Sun
Raw data from the solar probe is used to generate solar particles containing velocity and temperature, which the player must collect for points
3D game developed in Godot game engine

title: Pomodoro Widget
details: Web application with built-in timer for Pomodoro study technique, task list, and Spotify playlist
Responsive feedback for completion of tasks and study time
Uses Bootstrap UI library
Designed to be embedded as a Notion widget

title: SafeStay
details: 48-hour web application for UAH ACM Hackathon
Connects refugees with host families based on user preferences
Compatability algorithm based on a point system generates a compatability score for match rankings

title: Notion Clock Widget
details: Web application that displays date, time, and greeting message
Allows for custom background and text color for personalization
Designed to be embedded as a Notion widget
